name: Everest Inc. - Intermediate Milestone 2
description:
CS 6460 Educational Technology - Milestone 2 - Functional Prototype/Demo

This is a basic prototype for my CS 6460 project, Everest Inc.

The main goal for Milestone 2 is to complete some of the systems that will be used in the core game play.

This prototype includes all the tasks associated with Milestone 2:

  • Sherpa Recruitment & Generation System
  • Permits Upgrade System
  • Items and Supply System
  • Weather Report System
  • Scenes: Update Loading Screen, Welcome Screen, 

What's missing is the Expedition & Event System, which is where the core of the game play comes together. In this case it may seem as though this "prototype" is somewhat lacking when you compare its progress to Milestone 1, however much of the progress that was made was on the back end systems and how they integrate with the core game play.
